short_definition: A proceeding brought before a court by one party only, without notice to or challenge by the other side.
long_definition_html: A proceeding brought before a court by one party only, without notice to or challenge by the other side.
long_definition_markdown: A proceeding brought before a court by one party only, without notice to or challenge by the other side.
long_definition_text: A proceeding brought before a court by one party only, without notice to or challenge by the other side.
